settings.text: Earn 5,000 points in our rewards program to unlock the ability to purchase a plotter at 60% off. Click here to learn more.

settings.title: 28" SC2 Film Cutter
settings.text:
The 28" SC2 plotter is perfect for window tinters on the go or who just need to cut side window patterns.

+ Fast, precise stepper motors

+ Mobile vehicle friendly

- Limited to 20" or 24" rolls only

settings.title: 53" SC2  Film Cutter
settings.text:
The 53" SC2 will instantly become any shop's workhorse due to it's size, precision, and speed.

+ Fast, precise stepper motors

+ Craft nearly any size pattern

+ Compatible with most roll sizes

settings.title: 53" Titan 2 Film Cutter
settings.text:
Quieter, faster, and smoother, the 53" Titan 2 offers a step up with servo motors and upgraded construction.

+ Faster, quieter, and smoother servo motors

+ Craft nearly any size pattern

+ Aluminum alloy and all metal moving parts

+ Compatible with most roll sizes

settings.title: 68" Titan 3 Film Cutter
settings.text:
The 68" Titan 3 plotter is for the professional that wants to craft any pattern on any vehicle with no limitations.

+ Faster, quieter, and smoother servo motors

+ Craft any size pattern

+ Aluminum alloy and all metal moving parts

+ Vacuum hold down holes

+ Compatible with all common roll sizes

settings.title: What Size Plotter Do I Need?

settings.text: If you are a mobile installer who is tight on space or you just need a workhorse cutter to cut side windows and visor strips, the 28” plotter could be right for you. If you need more options and want to take advantage of cutting larger roll sizes for bigger windows, you definitely need to step up to the 53” or 68” plotters.

Don't be fooled by the size of the small and compact 28” plotter. This workhorse cutter will allow you to use 20” and 24” roll sizes to cut out side windows, truck rear windows, visor strips, and more. If you are a mobile installer or the type of installer who hand cuts front windshields and larger rear windows, the 28” plotter is the perfect companion.

If you demand more from your plotter, the 53” plotters are your next best choice. Not only will you be able to use 20” and 24” rolls, you will be able to use 36” and 40” roll sizes as well, allowing you to tackle most windows. In addition to having the capability to craft patterns side by side for better efficiency, you will also be able to cut patterns for larger windows like front windshields and full sized back windows. The 53” sized plotter can also easily tackle cutting paint protection film patterns and sign graphics.

The 68” plotter is the cream of the crop because it's ready to handle any roll size you throw at it. If you are the type of installer who wants to craft a pattern for any vehicle without any limitations, the 68” plotter is for you.

settings.subtitle: Craft Patterns Quickly & Precisely
settings.title: FlexCut Starter Kit
settings.text: Flexfilm has partnered with Film & Vinyl Designs to offer the most advanced cutting software found in the industry. FlexCut is designed to cut automotive window tint patterns, paint protection film patterns, and sign graphics. FlexCut also features one of the largest databases of patterns so you can find the right pattern to fit any job. FlexCut is also compatible with all of the plotter models that we carry.
